Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give up on something you believe in

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't agree, present what you think is a better way

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: No oyster in the world tastes as good as a Gulf oyster

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: Next to the Bible, I think the Constitution is the most important document ever written

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: If Republicans are going in the wrong direction, I am still willing to stand up against them

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: When building a strong team, you need a strong leader

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a conservative first

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: Ultimately, what we want to do is see the president follow the laws

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: We're going to try to solve problems for everyday people

Quote.Author: Steve Scalise
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to pass conservative policy. And we can only advance our values when we are united

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: All the best people in life seem to like LINUX

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of hacking is playing with other people, you know, getting them to do strange things

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: Atari is a very sad story

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever smart people work, doors are unlocked

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: After the Apple II was introduced, then came the Commodore and the Tandy TRS-80

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: In the end, I hope there's a little note somewhere that says I designed a good computer

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we did we were setting the tone for the world

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole life had been designing computers I could never build

Quote.Author: Steve Wozniak
Quote.QuoteValue: Creative things have to sell to get acknowledged as such

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: Casino gambling is colorful and dramatic and theatrical

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: If I complain about a traffic jam, I have no one to blame but myself

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: Money doesn't make people happy. People make people happy

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep it simple. Tell the truth. People can smell the truth

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a self-made brat

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I've changed my will to show my concern for animal rights

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody likes being around poor people, especially poor people

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a daredevil. I don't fly without a safety net

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone can make things that are beautiful; we need to make things that are remarkable

Quote.Author: Steve Wynn
Quote.QuoteValue: Washington is unpredictable these days

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: If anything, Powerpoint, if used well, would ideally reflect the way we think

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: Personality and socialization aren't the same thing

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: Many artists and scholars have pointed out that ultimately art depends on human nature

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: In any dispute, each side thinks it's in the right and the other side is demons

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: I like ice hockey. No one is ever going to ask me to write about that as a metaphor for life

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: You wouldn't believe the kind of hate mail I get about my work on irregular verbs

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: Societies that empower women are less violent in every way

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: We are visual creatures. Visual things stay put, whereas sounds fade

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: All our behaviours are a result of neurophysiological activity in the brain

Quote.Author: Steven Pinker
Quote.QuoteValue: Most intellectuals today have a phobia of any explanation of the mind that invokes genetics

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a lot harder now to be a police officer than what it used to be

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no fear of death. More important, I don't fear life

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I am hoping that I can be known as a great writer and actor some day, rather than a sex symbol

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: Any great warrior is also a scholar, and a poet, and an artist

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: My CIA godfather told me he'd never heard any American speak Japanese so well

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I love getting out on the streets and helping people

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: My people are my people. They love me and I love them. I would not be here without them

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I myself am a very nonviolent person and only resort to violence when I absolutely have to

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: Criminals usually prey on weakness. They can smell it

Quote.Author: Steven Seagal
Quote.QuoteValue: I always hated being a child. I always felt like an adult trapped in a child's body

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a fine line between censorship and good taste and moral responsibility

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though I get older, what I do never gets old, and that's what I think keeps me hungry

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I go to a movie, it's magic, no matter what the movie's about

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You shouldn't dream your film, you should make it!

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I dream for a living

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet has been this miraculous conduit to the undeniable truth to the Holocaust

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Why pay a dollar for a bookmark? Why not use the dollar for a bookmark?

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an American Jew and aware of the sensitivities involved in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: When I grow up, I still want to be a director

Quote.Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the smell of film. I just like knowing there's film going through the camera

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up with the smell of the lake and the feeling of the woods

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe life is random, but I doubt it

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Every life has a measure of sorrow, and sometimes this is what awakens us

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: The things that come to those that wait may be the things left by those that got there first

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Guitar players never listen to lead singers

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: If it is worth doing, it is worth overdoing

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: It was very difficult for me to be the only lyricist in the band

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: I had gotten one of the first Korg synthesizers with 300 presets

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: Fake it until you make it

Quote.Author: Steven Tyler
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to get inspired by something that touches my soul, or rocks my soul

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a real band guy, you know? I'm really good at certain things, and the band stuff is one of them

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: Reach for greatness, nothing less. And make sure you have some fun along the way

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: I was obsessed with politics in the '80s. I've recovered and I'm feeling much better now, thank you

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: Let the wealthier countries and corporations of the world fund an Emergency Organization

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always considered the government taking one out of every two dollars I earn absolute tyranny

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: Timing really is nearly everything. And what it isn't, circumstance makes up for

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: Young fans want to know about the past and older fans also want to find new music

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: You can trace the E Street Band directly back to the Rascals

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: Once Johnny Cash and Waylon Jennings are not cool on country radio, it's time for a new format

Quote.Author: Steven Van Zandt
Quote.QuoteValue: Life should never be boring

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: If you see somebody running down the street naked every single day, you stop looking up

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: Right now I'm not involved with anybody, but I hope by 75 I will be again

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: I was not going to be a stupid girl singer. I was going to be way more than that

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: By the time I was five, I was a little diva

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: He and I were about as compatible as a rat and a boa constrictor

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: Being able to take care of myself is something that my mom really instilled in me

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: The day before my 16th birthday I got my guitar

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: I had Botox and I hated it. For four long months, I looked like a different person

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: Prince and I were just friends. I think he would have been happy to have had a relationship

Quote.Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really like to be filmed

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is long but life is short

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't ask, you don't get

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because a man lacks the use of his eyes doesn't mean he lacks vision

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: Minds ripen at very different ages

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: Ya gots to work with what you gots to work with

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't base your life on other people's expectations

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: Eyes lie if you ever look into them for the character of the person

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us come together before we're annihilated

Quote.Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course I read Braille, yes

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: We have, I fear, confused power with greatness

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: Plans to protect air and water, wilderness and wildlife are in fact plans to protect man

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not a single person in Arizona today who would say the Grand Canyon was a mistake

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: Mining is like a search-and-destroy mission

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: Nuclear energy people perceive the greenhouse effect as a fresh wind blowing at their back

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: Wilderness, like the national park system, was an American idea

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature will take precedence over the needs of the modern man

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: Washington's a cesspool of money

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: Nixon was a good president on the environment. Gerald Ford was good

Quote.Author: Stewart Udall
Quote.QuoteValue: Utah today remains a battleground for land-use policies

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a higher law than the law of government. That's the law of conscience

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is born free

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually say I did the best I could with what I had. I have no major regrets

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: The knowledge I have now is not the knowledge I had then

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: The masses don't shed their blood for the benefit of a few individuals

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of life is to have no fear; it's the only way to function

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: Our grandfathers had to run, run, run. My generation's out of breath. We ain't running no more

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: The first need of a free people is to define their own terms

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: Before a group can enter the open society, it must first close ranks

Quote.Author: Stokely Carmichael
Quote.QuoteValue: Capitalism is a stupid system, a backward system

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if you don't like me, you know me because I'm just in your face

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: My approach is just fearless. I'm not afraid to try anything

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: I read so many books when I was a kid that I didn't even know were shaping me up

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit crazy, so sometimes I just get these mad ideas that, on paper, aren't even possible

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: Engineering was the safe and sensible choice, but music was what I loved and wanted to do

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: Most middle-aged white men probably don't know about little old Stormzy from London

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: Our parents don't always know what's right. It's a new age

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: It was my dream to come to Oxford and study political science

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: I just feel like there is nothing I cannot do

Quote.Author: Stormzy
Quote.QuoteValue: It's mad to think I was just a kid from south London, rapping in parks with friends

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: People who think dying is the worst thing don't know a thing about life

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there must be a place inside of us where dreams go and wait their turn

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always captivated by stories of women who find a way to be daring - misbehaving women

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't go in search of ideas; I try to let them find me

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to have a title before I start writing

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: With pencil, you can always erase

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: Unraveling external selves and coming home to our real identity is the true meaning of soul work

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer in the way ritual can put us in connection with our spirituality

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: I prefer to read print books. Maybe I'm just a little old-school. I do read e-books

Quote.Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote.QuoteValue: When I wrote 'The Secret Life of Bees,' I was writing about civil rights

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all given some sort of skill in life. Mine just happens to be beating up on people

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: Holyfield is nothing but class, and I think he's a breath of fresh air for the sport

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to talk about yourself

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: When I turned pro, Muhammad Ali was laying back, and I was able to fill up an area that was empty

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I was painfully initiated into boxing, because the guys I fought were a lot bigger than me

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: Boxing was the only career where I wouldn't have to start out at the bottom. I had a good resume

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: They say that I'm stubborn, and my wife says that, too, but it's paid off so far

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I fight, I always pray that no one gets hurt

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: Within our dreams and aspirations we find our opportunities

Quote.Author: Sugar Ray Leonard
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be like Bruce Jenner

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a minister, I'm not a philosopher, I'm not a politician, I'm in another category

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is a language, you see, a universal language

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: Today's symphonic music is sponsored by the upper structures of society

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: A prophet is not without honor except in his own country among his own people

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: People have set that up as a standard, not to recognize a prophet in his own country

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: Not too many people in America know about me, but all of Europe knows about me

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm playing dark history. It's beyond black. I'm dealing with the dark things of the cosmos

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: What I'm dealing with is so vast and great that it can't be called the truth. It's above the truth

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: I see people as they really are from a pure point of view

Quote.Author: Sun Ra
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a musician, but I'm another type of musician

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: She who succeeds in gaining the mastery of the bicycle will gain the mastery of life

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: There never will be complete equality until women themselves help to make laws and elect lawmakers

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: The day may be approaching when the whole world will recognize woman as the equal of man

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: No man is good enough to govern any woman without her consent

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Independence is happiness

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Men, their rights, and nothing more; women, their rights, and nothing less

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Organize, agitate, educate, must be our war cry

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: No self-respecting woman should wish or work for the success of a party who ignores her sex

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: For every betrayed woman, there is always the betrayer, man

Quote.Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Suffrage is the pivotal right

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: If you cut down a forest, it doesn't matter how many sawmills you have if there are no more trees

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: The World Bank is now the biggest culprit in the debt crisis

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: The Sierra Club in the United States has now really come out for population control and reduction

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: What's immediately profitable is the only kind of logic that capitalism understands

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: Only around 2% of the earth's surface is cultivatable land

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: Subsidize... or lend

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: As the rich consume more and more, they are clearly not going to want to downgrade their own status

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a lot of people who don't contribute anything to consumption and production

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: If the economy becomes disembodied from society it can only lead to disaster

Quote.Author: Susan George
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems to be the thing now that young people are getting back into politics

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: The only interesting answers are those that destroy the questions

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: The camera makes everyone a tourist in other people's reality, and eventually in one's own

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: What we need is to use what we have

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: I was not looking for my dreams to interpret my life, but rather for my life to interpret my dreams

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: Sanity is a cozy lie

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: Lying is the most simple form of self-defence

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: Interpretation is the revenge of the intellectual upon art

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: The becoming of man is the history of the exhaustion of his possibilities

Quote.Author: Susan Sontag
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not significant details, illuminated by a flash, fixed forever. Photographs are

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are grateful - when you can see what you have - you unlock blessings to flow in your life

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: People have got to learn: if they don't have cookies in the cookie jar, they can't eat cookies

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: Many people are in the dark when it comes to money, and I'm going to turn on the lights

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: Give to yourself as much as you give of yourself! This means you have to put yourself first

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: Owning a home is a keystone of wealth - both financial affluence and emotional security

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have debt I'm willing to bet that general clutter is a problem for you too

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: Opposites may attract, but I wouldn't put my money on a relationship of financial opposites

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going down the street and you're going the wrong way, remember - God permits U-turns

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: Never cosign a loan. Once you have cosigned, you cannot get out of it - even on your deathbed

Quote.Author: Suze Orman
Quote.QuoteValue: Private student loans should be avoided at all costs

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Your duty is to treat everybody with love as a manifestation of the Lord

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Today is your own. Tomorrow perchance may never come

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not love leisure. Waste not a minute. Be bold. Realize the Truth, here and now!

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: It is divinity that shapes, not only your ends, but also your acts, your words and thoughts

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Practice meditation regularly. Meditation leads to eternal bliss. Therefore meditate, meditate

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: God is all-full. He is self-contained. He is eternal satisfaction

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Thinking of disease constantly will intensify it. Feel always 'I am healthily in body and mind'

Quote.Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote.QuoteValue: Meditation is painful in the beginning but it bestows immortal Bliss and supreme joy in the end

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm disappearing, avoiding most things

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: Fairy-tales are nice

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: Have you seen the roses? There's a whole lot of colours

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I do tend to take lines from other lines I like, and then write around them

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really read a lot. Maybe I should

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I like songs that are simple

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I never felt so close to a guitar as that silver one with mirrors that I used on stage all the time

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I think young people should have a lot of fun. But I never seem to have any

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't always this introverted

Quote.Author: Syd Barrett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm full of dust and guitars

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: When I hear somebody say 'Life is hard', I am always tempted to ask 'Compared to what?'

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: If a small thing has the power to make you angry, does that not indicate something about your size?

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is a direction, not a place

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no point in burying a hatchet if you're going to put up a marker on the site

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the best, and only effective, way to kill an idea is to put it into practice

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?'

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: A winner rebukes and forgives; a loser is too timid to rebuke and too petty to forgive

Quote.Author: Sydney J. Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge fills a large brain; it merely inflates a small one

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe any success in life is made by going into an area with a blind, furious optimism

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually whenever you're scared of something, do it. If you're not afraid of it, don't do it

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: Clothing is the first step to building a character

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: In the movies, I kill guys with an axe. In real life, I can't control a nine-year-old girl

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: If bad decorating was a hanging offense, there'd be bodies hanging from every tree!

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: If you express yourself too much, you're considered weak

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: Playing polo is like trying to play golf during an earthquake

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I'm incredibly unpredictable, and that's the only thing I'm sure of

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: I have great expectations for the future, because the past was highly overrated

Quote.Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to show your soul otherwise you're just a piece of equipment

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: No water, no life. No blue, no green

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I slip into the ocean, it's like going home

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to respect the oceans and take care of them as if our lives depended on it. Because they do

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: Health to the ocean means health for us

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: I personally have stopped eating seafood

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has power. But it doesn't help if you don't use it

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: I find the lure of the unknown irresistible

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always said, 'Underwater or on top, men and women are compatible.'

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: We have become frighteningly effective at altering nature

Quote.Author: Sylvia Earle
Quote.QuoteValue: Ice ages have come and gone. Coral reefs have persisted
